description: A new nation established by the http://anidb.net/ch1738 [Crossbone Vanguard], made up of the captured space colonies of the Frontier Side. Under the leadership of the Ronah family, Cosmo Babylonia is dedicated to the principles of aristocracy and noblesse oblige. Cosmo Babylonia soon establishes an alliance with the Jupiter Fleet, allowing it to stave off Earth Federation interference with the threat of an energy embargo.
name: Cosmo Babylonia
